name: Xorn
description: A strange, three-legged creature with a thick, rocky hide, a large mouth on top of its head, and three claws. It has three eyes that allow for all-direction vision.
memorable: Can phase through stone and has a distinctive ability to sense treasure from afar.
goals: Primarily seeks to consume gems, precious metals, and minerals.
relations: Typically associated with rocky environments and may be encountered with other elemental creatures.
environment: Native to the Elemental Plane of Earth, commonly found in rocky or hilly areas.
strengths: Excellent treasure-finding capabilities; durable with high hit points and armor class.
weaknesses: Slow movement speed can leave it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Makes three melee claw attacks and one bite attack, capable of consuming metal objects.
most_powerful_ability: Treasure Sense allows it to smell and locate valuable items from up to 500 feet away.
senses: Possesses tremorsense up to 60 feet, enabling it to detect vibrations in the ground.
skills: Proficient in perception and stealth, allowing it to detect and hide effectively.
additional_information: Can burrow through earth without leaving a trace.
Has advantage on stealth checks in rocky terrain.
Can hinder foes with crystalline shards using its Shard Belch ability.
Agile in its native environment, making it a tricky adversary.
Resistance to damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine.
test_queries: rocky creature with treasure sense ability
slow-moving elemental found in rocky areas
burrowing earth creature that guards treasure
